welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hoeselt, Belgium! This cozy town is known for its charming atmosphere and delicious local cuisine. We invite you to explore and experience all that Hoeselt has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Maastricht/aachen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Maastricht/aachen Airport, mainly used for charter and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liege Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: Dedicated terminal for cargo flights, with state-of-the-art facilities for handling and storage.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kempen Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kempen Airport handles freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Aachen/Merzbruck Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Aachen/Merzbruck Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Geilenkirchen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
